document_data.name: Eli Marshking
document_data.Activities: Eli led a mixed patrol of mercenaries and Zhents in search of possible troubles in the dale, and desiring to gain loot in the meantime.
document_data.Personality: Eli was a swaggering man with a great sense of his self-importance. He enjoyed bullying the Dalesfolk and always took a large share from the loot gained from his men.
